name: Mini Quote Book Kit (pink, orange, and green)
description:
This is a mini book kit consisting of clear transparency pages, scalloped patterned papers (Scenic Route and Heidi Swapp), one acrylic stamp, ribbon, buttons, a Making Memories Funky Vintage Fabulous flower, a chipboard Q, gems, and a q-tip (for applying paint). Use this kit to compile a collection of your favorite quotes (I put a favorite quote on each page and explained why it's important to me in my own writing but you can do lots of things with this kit. It can also be used for other themes such as favorite photos, recipes, as a baby or bridal shower gift, etc).

Aside from this kit, you will need:

*adhesive
*1-2 sheets of neutral colored cardstock to print or write quotes on
*white paint
*Ink (to use with the favorite stamp)
*an acrylic block to use with the acrylic stamp. If you don't have one, you can temporarily adhere the stamp to a piece of wood or something hard.

optional:

*label sticker for the back
*circular stamp to place the flower in on the cover
*any other embellishments you want to add
*black pen
*needle and thread

You can see a picture of my completed book here (with different papers): http://bighugelabs.com/flickr/onblack.php?id=2287246839&bg=white&posted=1

I will email you detailed instructions once you purchase the kit, along with pictures of my book in detail.

I hope you will love this kit as much as I do. Let me know if you have any questions.
